Articles.Content: Is there any tutorials on how to make flags? There is a request a flag thread but it has long since died. Being able to do your own flag would be really cool becaause A) Means you'll get it the way you want if it's beyond symbol on X background color, You don't have to deal with the awkwardness of telling the person that did work for you for free something is off about the flag.

http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Tutorial:Create_custom_flags!

This should answer all of your questions about flag making. Enjoy!

EDIT: URL fixed.

Edited November 13, 2014 by turkwinif
URL fixed. Thanks Cpt. Kipard for pointing out.
Could you fix that link please? You left out the exclamation mark.
